label: Authenticator Pro
reason:
Open source Authenticator app featuring modern design, and compatibility with WearOS.
Not available on F-droid yet because it is a Xamarin app (https://github.com/jamie-mh/AuthenticatorPro/issues/2#issuecomment-835407250)

label: ente Authenticator
reason: 2FA app made by ente. Requires a paid subscription to their service (or free trial)
